DOC.brief_summary: This study addresses the influence of anesthesia induction, ventilation and influence of cardiac surgical procedures and cardio-pulmonary-bypass on right ventricular function. Influence on patient outcome is also studied. Three dimensional echocardiography is applied.
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Three Dimensional Right Ventricular Function
DOC.criteria: informed consent given cardiac surgical procedure left sided cardiac surgery or bypass surgery, ascending aortic surgery, assist device implantation pregnant patients contraindication for transesophageal echocardiography
